description: see http://hl7.org/fhir/json.html#schema for information about the FHIR Json Schemas

allOf.description: A slot of time on a schedule that may be available for booking appointments.

serviceCategory.description: A broad categorisation of the service that is to be performed during this appointment.

serviceType.description: The type of appointments that can be booked into this slot (ideally this would be an identifiable service - which is at a location, rather than the location itself). If provided then this overrides the value provided on the availability resource.

specialty.description: The specialty of a practitioner that would be required to perform the service requested in this appointment.

appointmentType.description: The style of appointment or patient that has been booked in the slot (not service type).

schedule.description: The schedule resource that this slot defines an interval of status information.

start.description: Date/Time that the slot is to begin.

end.description: Date/Time that the slot is to conclude.

overbooked.description: This slot has already been overbooked, appointments are unlikely to be accepted for this time.

comment.description: Comments on the slot to describe any extended information. Such as custom constraints on the slot.
